events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on the highway impacting the front bumper and windshield.
After reviewing initial details, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident for further processing.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to manage the vehicle collision case and assist the claimant.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and confirmed next steps with the customer.
Requested police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates from the customer to proceed with claim evaluation.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report and detailed photos of the car damages.
The investigation team initiated the process to verify circumstances surrounding the vehicle collision.
Investigation completed with confirmation that the accident was due to another driver's fault, coverage validated.
A settlement proposal was sent to the claimant outlining repair cost coverage and deductible details.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication so far.
Claim was officially approved following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Insurance payment was processed and issued to the claimant to cover vehicle repairs as agreed.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment and repair arrangements were completed.
All case files were archived electronically to maintain proper records for future reference.
